it.emarolab.scene_identification_tracking.semanticSceneLibrary.objects

Class Semantics.Base

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.emarolab.scene_identification_tracking.semanticSceneLibrary.objects.Semantics.Base
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Semantics.Logger
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Array3D, MORDescriptor, MORPrimitive, Semantics.MappingState, Semantics.Try, ShapeTracker, Tracker.Item
    Enclosing interface:
    Semantics

    public static class Semantics.Base
extends java.lang.Object
implements Semantics.Logger
    Defines common function for debugging and logging.

    By default this implementation enable not verbose printing (only errors and warnings). See showDebugs(boolean), showDebug(boolean), shutDownLoggers(boolean) and shutDownLogger(boolean) for dynamic and static tune such a behaviour.

    This interface should be implemented by all the classes in this software architecture. Unfortunately, this implementation is a very basic interface to a logger.

    File: it.emarolab.scene_identification_tracking.semanticSceneLibrary.objects.Semantics

    affiliation: DIBRIS, EMAROLab, University of Genoa.
    date: 06/01/2017
    See Also:
    Semantics.Logger, Semantics.MappingTry, Array3D, MORDescriptor, MORPrimitive

      • showDebug

        public void showDebug(boolean d)
        Enable/disable verbose printings (has the same effect as showDebugs(boolean)).
        Parameters:
        d - set to true for being verbose. Otherwise, only errors and warnings will be printed.

      • showDebugs

        public static void showDebugs(boolean d)
        Enable/disable verbose printings (has the same effect as showDebug(boolean)).
        Parameters:
        d - set to true for being verbose. Otherwise, only errors and warnings will be printed.

      • shutDownLogger

        public void shutDownLogger(boolean shutDown)
        Dinable/Enable all the printings (has the same effect as shutDownLoggers(boolean)).
        Parameters:
        shutDown - set to true to disable all printing. Otherwise, prints based on showDebug(boolean).

      • shutDownLoggers

        Parameters:
        shutDown - set to true to disable all printing. Otherwise, prints based on showDebugs(boolean).
